name: MaFl_Phoho
oralText: I shall cut down our enemy with one swift thrust!
introText: What do you want?! Can't you see I'm busy? We've got a lot of training to do! Begone, pest!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: They call me Phoho Andere and I am one of the hired Soldiers of Kion. No one, I repeat, NO ONE is better with a blade than I am! Care to test that theory with a little wager? Hmm?
